description: Steam's Remote Play feature that allows playing Steam games on phones / tablets / TVs / other PCs while streamed from your main gaming system now is able to handle AV1 video streaming...
title: Steam Remote Play Adds AV1 Video Streaming Support Plus More Linux Fixes

description: If you have been trying out Linux 6.12-rc1 or a recent Linux Git snapshot and discovered your laptop's touchpad is no longer working, you are far from alone. The good news is the issue has been quickly tracked down and has led to a new input driver being reverted...
title: Linux 6.12 Drops New Driver That Ended Up Breaking Laptop Touchpad Support For Many Users

description: A roadmap/schedule has been published for the lightweight Xfce 4.20 desktop. If all goes well this next iteration of the Xfce desktop will be out before Christmas...
title: Xfce 4.20 Aiming For Release In December

description: For those wanting to build really nifty and complex text user interfaces (TUIs) for terminal applications, Notcurses is one of the options for maximizing the "terminal bling" with some rather vibrant features that goes well beyond what's offered with the likes of Ncurses. It's been nearly two years since the last release while was surprised today to see out a new version...
title: Notcurses Is Still Alive For Ramping Up "Terminal Bling" With Complex TUIs

description: The Linux 6.11 kernel introduced getrandom() in the vDSO for faster yet secure user-space random number generation needs. In addition to patches pending for Glibc to make use of getrandom() vDSO support, Golang is now another early user of this functionality...
title: Golang Now Enables Speedier getrandom() On Linux
